fields.description: I have an i18n folder with en and pt-PT folders and it works when I deploy on iOS, if I deploy on Android it aborts the build with an error, regarding values-pt-PT not being valid. if I change to pt-rPT it works on Android but then when I deploy on iOS I won't have the desired language, falling back to en strings.xml values, even though the system language is pt-PT. Please fix this, it is a major inconvenience for app localisation.
fields.summary: Android: region-specific i18n files need to be copied to res with "r" in front of region
fields.environment: Mac OS X Mavericks 10.9.3, Titanium studio 3.2.3, iOS 7.1, Android 4.0.4.
